original_text: O that ye would altogether hold your peace! and it should be your wisdom.
korean_text: 너희가 참으로 잠잠하면 그것이 너희의 지혜일 것이니라

sentences.original_text: O that ye would altogether hold your peace!
sentences.korean_translation: 아, 너희가 완전히 침묵하면 좋을 것이다!

sentences.original_text: and it should be your wisdom.
